German DDR T-72M1 sight

THIS IS NOT MY WORK! I only made it work for the German version, nothing more.

Guide how to sight:
https://gunnerheatpc.com/news/articles/gunnery-guide-t-72m1

Original sight: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1075137/en/
#t72m1 #german #t_72m1 #t_72_m1_germany #t_72_m1 #sight

@_cricco_

ENG:
THIS IS A SPECIAL SIGHT FOR IT-1 used to solve the problem that the flight trajectory of the missile does not coincide with the front sight after the update.

line1：After the missile is stable in flight, the missile’s trajectory is on this line. (And the missile trajectory gradually moves from the lower end to the upper end of the line)

line2：The lowest point of the missile’s trajectory after the missile is stable in flight.

line3：The lowest point of the missile’s trajectory when the missile is just launched. (Used to judge whether the missile will hit the ground)

list.description:
A sight for type-69-II G（中）
1.
Download and unzip the file then put it in your usersights file.（only for type692G）
2.
Open your option and change this sight.
3.
When you turn on the crosshair illumination system，it will turns green.
For adaptation to other vehicles‘ sights please contact with me.
如需要其他车辆适配 请联系

Simplistic sights v1
A pack of multiple sights to suit your preferences.

This project is no longer maintained but should work in future versions.

If you have any problems with my sights, please contact me and I'll try to support you!
Thanks for using my custom sights! Thank you so much and have a nice day!!!
See you later and sooner @~@
